name: Fresh Wind of Freedom
title: Fresh Wind of Freedom
desc: "The heavenly bard brushed the strings of the lyre, summoning forth the gale, dispersing the ice and snow, cleaving the peaks, and making the new Mondstadt the home of freedom."
